PlanetCoasterXML

Class PlanetCoasterReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterReader

  • public class PlanetCoasterReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class read a single planet coaster xml file storing the data in a LinkedListMultimap; I cannot use a normal HashMap because i need duplicate keys, and to keep the insertion order
    The Keys are Strings because the translations Keys are simple strings
    The translated phrase is stored into a byte[] because i can store it in UTF-8 (or another encoding if i want to change).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean isnewFile
      Boolean that represent if is the new file, if so i need to store comments
      com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap<java.lang.String,byte[]> loaded_file_multimap
      LinkedListMultimap that contains the loaded file

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlanetCoasterReader(java.lang.String file_to_open, boolean isfinalfile)
      The constructor method open the file and call a method to fill the LinkedListMultimap

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> extractComments()
      This function extract all the comments from the loaded file, returning them
      Remember that the reader has "isnewFile", this means the comments are loaded only in the second file
      (You can simply change that in the Window class if you want, setting it at true)
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> extractKeys()
      This function extract all the keys from the loaded file, returning them
      java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> extractValues()
      This function extract all the entries from the loaded file, returning them
      private void scan_node(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
      This method scan all the nodes under the root
      While scanning all the nodes, this method fill the two arrays with all the values

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        LinkedListMultimap that contains the loaded file

      • isnewFile

        private final boolean isnewFile
        Boolean that represent if is the new file, if so i need to store comments

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlanetCoasterReader

        public PlanetCoasterReader(java.lang.String file_to_open,
                           boolean isfinalfile)
                    throws PlanetCoasterReaderException
        The constructor method open the file and call a method to fill the LinkedListMultimap
        Parameters:
        file_to_open - the path with the filename to open
        isfinalfile - if is the final file i need to consider comments
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterReaderException - throw an invalid UTF-8 charset exception (from scan_node()) or a generic Exception if the XML file is not valid

    • Method Detail

      • scan_node

        private void scan_node(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                throws PlanetCoasterReaderException
        This method scan all the nodes under the root
        While scanning all the nodes, this method fill the two arrays with all the values
        Parameters:
        node - the root node, where i start to scan
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterReaderException - if the string format is not valid

      • extractKeys

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> extractKeys()
        This function extract all the keys from the loaded file, returning them
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with all the keys in the loaded file

      • extractValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> extractValues()
        This function extract all the entries from the loaded file, returning them
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with all the values (entries) in the loaded file

      • extractComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> extractComments()
        This function extract all the comments from the loaded file, returning them
        Remember that the reader has "isnewFile", this means the comments are loaded only in the second file
        (You can simply change that in the Window class if you want, setting it at true)
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with all the comments in the loaded file
